reviewText: Who would have guessed that the sweet kid who sang at the Hungry Eye in San Francisco all those years ago would have become the greatest singer, performer of our time. Just listen to him after fifty (50!) years and you will see why EVERYONE thought so. You had to be there.. and you have to be here. Watch this man sing - listen to that voice! Bliss!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Living in Las Vegas aaw him in concert many years ago with Henry Mancini. Wow what a concert and no, they are not talkers, they are performers. My only negative comment is that he needn't make his hair and eyebrows so dark as they could be pure silver and he is still the same. Few could, but age simply doesn't show nor has his voice altered a bit.
summary: His voice as wonderful, wonderful as ever

reviewText: Johnny Mathis, as the good french wines, older means better. You can believe his age just because you see him but his voice is not only the same but better, maybe he uses it with much more experience.
Title: N/A

reviewText: A fantastic concert. Mathis is so appealing in this show that it's amazing! He's personable and affable and of course, incredibly talented.  My wife Louise and I have been Mathis fans forever so this is right up our alley.  A terrific live performance with timeless songs and a magnificent band.  Great additional features as well.  Trust me: if you are fan of 1)Johnny Mathis  or 2) great music  or 3) great concerts, you don't want to miss this DVD.  Get it. It's one of the best!
summary: WHAT'S NOT TO LIKE?  IT'S JOHNNY MATHIS!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I've loved and admired this man since I first heard him sing my favorite song in the whole world, "Misty."  Where does one start when trying to describe Johnny Mathis? To use an old cliche` he is a legend in his time and he is one of my role models. Johnny did have an excellent voice teacher when he first started out but he also takes care of himself too. Sure he can't hit the high notes like he did when he was younger but that isn't the most important thing. This man literally loves to sing and you can hear it in the way he delivers a song. Or, if you're lucky enough to see him in person, it's very noticeable in his stage presence, expression on his face and you can hear it in his voice, he loves to sing. Johnny is one of the very few singers today who sings the romantic songs and the ballads the way they should be sung. I've seen Johnny in concert three times and am going to have the pleasure of seeing him once again in December, 2009. I hope Johnny is able to sing for many more years to come and it will be a sad day in entertainment when he retires.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Johnny could still hit all the notes.  I loved this DVD.  Excellent recording.  He sang most of my favorites.  I would recommend this to anyone.

reviewText: This Johnny Mathis DVD is so wonderful with alot of great songs & Mathis singing is so sweet & great that it makes you want to hear him all year around. I am a fan of his music . I can say my favorite song of his is Maria! It's my name can I say more........... Johnny sings it with love & power from the west side story great song. Your going to love his cd as well . It's all 5 stars in my eyes always...........

reviewText: Johnny Mathis is truly one of the Greatest vocalists ever and this special highlights his Career as he covers so many classics. He is truly a Living Legend. everything was well Produced and played as well.

reviewText: If you are a real fan of Johnny Mathis, you must have this. The voice is as beautiful as ever. The lighting is terrible for poor Mr. Mathis but not for your DVD player. I've seen him in person recently and he looks 15 years younger than on this DVD......However, for the singing and the beauty of his humble personality alone, buy it. Great for collectors as well as people who just love great music.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was a little disappointed with this DVD concert after watching his PBS Concert "Live by Johnny Request". I gave it 5 stars his voice sounded better to me maybe because it was a earlier performance. This DVD is just average its alright if you are interested in a more recent concert this the one. But if you just want Johnny's best the PBS is the one.I usually watch the PBS Concert every Saturday Night before I go out dancing it puts me in a romantic mood.

reviewText: I saw this on the HD network. I loved it and bought it. The concert is two years old but this is Johnny as he will be remembered.
summary: 50th Anniversary concert. Sounds as good as when he was younger.
